      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TrustOptions TrustOptions.setAutoAccept(boolean autoAccept)
      Sets true/false to automatically accept yes/no prompting.
      TrustOptions TrustOptions.setAutoRefuse(boolean autoRefuse)
      Sets true/false to automatically refuse yes/no prompting.
      TrustOptions TrustOptions.setForce(boolean force)
      Sets true/false to forcibly install fingerprint.
      TrustOptions TrustOptions.setReplacement(boolean replacement)
      Sets true/false that a replacement fingerprint is to be affected
